body: http://imgur.com/YZPSHTs Some new potions ? And if you don't know, there is a non-used quiver on minecraft textures, and rubys too :o
body_tagged: http://imgur.com/YZPSHTs Some new potions ? And if you don't know, there is a non-used quiver on minecraft textures, and rubys too :o
title: Did you even notice that?

replies.body:
Yea I noticed that, the ruby was replaced with the emerald :D
The quiver thing is useless I think.
and the new potion is jumpboost.
replies.body_tagged:
Yea I noticed that, the ruby was replaced with the emerald :D

and the new potion is jumpboost.

replies.body: No, look on the names, fancy potions, elegant potion....
replies.body_tagged: No, look on the names, fancy potions, elegant potion....

replies.body: :O I didn't saw it. And I don't know anything about them. But kewl :D
replies.body_tagged: :O I didn't saw it. And I don't know anything about them. But kewl :D

replies.body: So, am I the first to notice it? :o
replies.body_tagged: So, am I the first to notice it? :o

replies.body:
Those potions are in Vanilla Minecrafting Coding, it is not possible to create through brewing, but it is obtainable through 3rd party modification programs or mods. Look up about potions in the minecraft wiki, their is a long list of those weird unheard potions.
EDIT- And yes, notch has a sprite of an un-used quiver texture in the Items.png file for default minecraft textures
replies.body_tagged:
Those potions are in Vanilla Minecrafting Coding, it is not possible to create through brewing, but it is obtainable through 3rd party modification programs or mods. Look up about potions in the minecraft wiki, their is a long list of those weird unheard potions.
EDIT- And yes, notch has a sprite of an un-used quiver texture in the Items.png file for default minecraft textures

replies.body: There was something like this on the minecraft wiki (since I used to read that way too much.) But yeah, they were going to add a ton new potions that were pretty useless x)

replies.body: Why do we need a jump potion? Can't Mojang make a useful potion like resistance?
